# Read GCAM Data
<p align="center"> <img src="vignettefigs/metisHeaderThick.PNG"></p>
<!-------------------------->
<!-------------------------->

For a full list of available params for this function please see [colors, maps and params](https://jgcri.github.io/metis/articles/vignette_colorsMapsParams/#params-1.html)

```{r, eval=F}
library(metis)


dataGCAM <- metis.readgcam (
       #gcamdatabase = “Path_to_GCAMdatabase”,
       dataProjFile = metis::exampleGCAMProj)

df <- dataGCAM$data
dfParam <- dataGCAM$dataAggParam
dfClass1 <- dataGCAM$dataAggClass1
```
